name: MECHAPLANET
description: Made for my final college Game-Jam assignment with the prompt being "Exploration." I wanted to make this an interesting one, given that it was the final project for that class and I finally got an interesting prompt. I took a few ideas from a personal project of mine and randomly decided to follow a First-Person player controller (based off of Titanfall 2) tutorial series one night. Unity, Visual Studio, Blender, Illustrator, Clip Studio Paint, and Photoshop were used to create this.
